TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RotateTransform3D extends System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AffineTransform3D
Public NotInheritable Class RotateTransform3D Inherits AffineTransform3D

span.span: Specifies a rotation transformation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Rotaciones en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] suelen constar de dos argumentos: un punto alrededor del que va a girar un objeto o conjunto de objetos y un valor en grados o radianes que determina la cantidad de giro.Rotations in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] usually consist of two arguments: a point around which to rotate an object or set of objects, and a value in degrees or radians that determines the amount of rotation. En [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)], es necesario especificar un en lugar de un punto alrededor del que va a girar.In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)], it is necessary to specify a rather than a point around which to rotate. Rotaciones en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)] son más complejos cuando se animan.Rotations in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)] become more complicated when they are animated. Para animar una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)] rotación usando , se puede animar la o propiedades de un , o especificar un para la transformación...To animate a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)] rotation using , you can animate the or properties of an , or specify a for the transform.. Rotaciones de eje o ángulo en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)] se especifican en grados, radianes no.Axis/angle rotations in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)] are specified in degrees, not radians. ## Examples [!code-csharp[3doverview#3DOverview3DN1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/3DOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#3doverview3dn1)] [!code-vb[3doverview#3DOverview3DN1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/3DOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3doverview3dn1)] [!code-xaml[animate3drotation#Animate3DRotation3DN1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Animate3DRotation/CS/Window1.xaml#animate3drotation3dn1)]
